# PCAN-Basic (vendored)
 
Vendor: PEAK-System
Purpose: CAN interface library used by Transport.Pcan wrapper.
 
Vendored contents:
- include/PCANBasic.h
- lib/x64/Debug/PCANBasic.lib
- lib/x64/Release/PCANBasic.lib
- bin/x64/PCANBasic.dll
 
Source package/version: <version of SDK downloaded>
Date vendored: 2026-01-29
 
Notes:
- PCAN driver must be installed on target machines to use real PCAN hardware.
